definition: solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
woods/forest/CL:片[pian4]/circle(s) (i.e. specific group of people)/a collection (of similar things)

sentences.english: Voll says cooperating in education is fundamental to better relations between the U.S. and the Muslim world.
sentences.chinese: 沃尔说，教育合作是美国改善与穆斯林关系的基础。

sentences.english: Sea burials are permissible for Muslims in extraordinary circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 海葬对于穆斯林来说只会用于极端的情况下。

sentences.english: In this month, Muslims from all around the world fast in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 在这个月里，世界各地的穆斯林在白天都要禁食。

sentences.english: In 638 the Moslems had captured Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 公元638年穆斯林人占领了耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: In Malaysia, officials have warned Muslims against celebrating.
sentences.chinese: 在马拉西亚，官方已经警告过穆斯林要反对庆祝了。

sentences.english: Salaam is a Muslim form of salutation.
sentences.chinese: 额手礼是穆斯林的问候方式。

sentences.english: Akinjis, meaning 'raiders', are light cavalry serving in Muslim forces.
sentences.chinese: 阿金基意为骑兵，是服役于穆斯林军中的轻骑兵部队。

sentences.english: The group was led by black ministers and the local leader of the Black Muslims.
sentences.chinese: 这个组织的领导人是黑人牧师和当地黑人穆斯林首领。

sentences.english: Wander through awned streets. Turbaned faces going by.
sentences.chinese: 一张张缠了穆斯林头巾的脸走了过去。

sentences.english: Saying these words aloud three times makes the speaker a Muslim.
sentences.chinese: 把这些话大声说上三遍，说话人就成了穆斯林。

sentences.english: He's weak and the Fundie Muslims know it.
sentences.chinese: 他太弱了，而那些原教主义穆斯林知道这一点。

sentences.english: Men who follow Islam and fight for their faith atop heavily armored horses.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林重骑兵为信仰而战，为真主而战。

sentences.english: Ruled by the Turks until1916, Jidda has long been used as a port by Moslem pilgrims making the journey to Mecca.
sentences.chinese: 吉达长期以来是穆斯林朝圣者通往麦加城的旅行港口。
印度教和穆斯林的关系不错。

sentences.english: The school will train Muslim, Jewish and Christian clergy together.
sentences.chinese: 这所学校同时培训穆斯林，犹太教和基督教牧师。

sentences.english: Heavy Swordsmen who follow Islam and fight for their faith.
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林重装剑士为信仰而战，为真主而战。

definition: the Copts, major ethnoreligious group of Egyptian Christians
